remarks: Function returning the isomorphisms of the category ` c ` .  Definition 3.8 of [Adamek] p. 28, and definition in [Lang] p. 54.  (Contributed by FL, 9-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-iso $p |- Iso = ( c e. Cat |-> ( ( x e. _V |-> dom x ) o. ( Inv ` c ) ) ) $.
$d c x $.
